# Micropost AI

Micropost AI is an AI-powered social media ghostwriter that helps users grow on Twitter and LinkedIn.

## Core Features
- **AI Content Generation:** Generates posts based on user voice and topics.
- **Scheduling:** Automates posting to Twitter, LinkedIn, and Threads.
- **Studio:** Creates visual assets (social cards, vertical videos).
- **Tools:** Suite of mini-tools for repurposing content (e.g., YouTube Summarizer, Tweet to LinkedIn).

## Key Links
- Home: https://micropost-ai.com
- Pricing: https://micropost-ai.com/pricing
- Login: https://micropost-ai.com/login
- API Docs: https://micropost-ai.com/docs (if available)

## Contact
